A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. Not at all what I expected after The Force Awakens. Poe's character was abrasive throughout the movie and Finn and Rose's scenes together felt. Dry forced. It's unfortunate that Finn took such a back seat to this addition to the franchise. So much action with very little progression in the plot and scarce character development besides Rey\, Poe\, and Kyle Ren. Most unfortunate.
